alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Herkimer County through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Star Lake to near Yorkville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, Ohio, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Big Moose, McKeever, Limekiln Lake Campground, Nicks Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Northwood, Alger Island Public Campground, Russia, Norway, Beaver River, Nobleboro, Curtis, Farrel Corner and First Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
